Has anyone heard of these guys?

http://www.neuroblast.net

Sounds like they're doing something similar to NEAT.  Some of the comments
on their site seem a little naive and overambitious to me.  Like these:

"And while the mechanisms underlying intelligence are hardly understood at
all, the mechanisms underlying evolution are as well understood as any
phenomenon known to science."

"We propose to create a dynamic virtual world of complex and interacting
genes, genomes, organisms and populations that compete against one another
in a rigorous selection regime in which fitness is judged by one criterion
alone: intelligence."

Of course, there's a Harvard PhD behind it all, so maybe they know more than
I do :)

- Philip
